name: Duck Creek
title: duckcreek.com
shortDescription: Duck Creek provides a suite of low-code SaaS core systems designed specifically for P&C/general insurance. It enables insurers to deliver protection faster and smarter, enhancing customer experiences through personalized services. Insurers can quickly adapt to market changes using Duck Creek's reusable product modules, thereby accelerating product development and distribution.
pros: Supports rapid development and deployment of new products
cons: Primarily focused on P&C insurance, not all types
May require initial training for optimal use
Potential high cost for full suite and services

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Insurity
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Offers cloud solutions and data analytics

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Majesco
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Focus on innovation and digital insurance
